sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Box, Typography, Grid, Paper, CircularProgress } from "@mui/material"; import { getOrdersByUser } from "../api/orders"; export default function OrdersPage({ currentUser }) { const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { if (!currentUser) { setOrders([]); setLoading(false); return; } getOrdersByUser(currentUser.username) .then(res => setOrders(res.data || [])) .catch(console.error) .finally(() => setLoading(false)); }, [currentUser]); if (loading) return <CircularProgress sx={{ mt: 5, display: "block", mx: "auto" }} />; if (!orders.length) return <Typography sx={{ p: 3 }}>You have not placed any orders yet.</Typography>; return ( <Box sx={{ p: 3 }}> <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mb: 3 }}>My Orders</Typography> <Grid container spacing={2}> {orders.map(order => ( <Grid item xs={12} key={order.id}> <Paper sx={{ p: 2 }}> <Typography variant="h6">Order ID: {order.id}</Typography> <Typography>User: {order.userName}</Typography> <Typography>Total: ₹{order.totalPrice}</Typography> <Typography>Delivery Date: {new Date(order.deliveryDate).toLocaleDateString()}</Typography> <Typography>Delivery Slot: {order.deliverySlot}</Typography> <Box sx={{ mt: 1 }}> <Typography variant="subtitle1">Items:</Typography> {order.items.map((item, idx) => ( <Paper key={idx} sx={{ p: 1, mt: 1 }}> <Typography>Name: {item.product?.name ?? item.name}</Typography> <Typography>Quantity: {item.quantity}</Typography> <Typography>Price: ₹{item.totalPrice ?? item.finalPrice}</Typography> <Typography>Options: {item.selectedOptions ?? JSON.stringify(item.selectedSingle)}</Typography> </Paper> ))} </Box> </Paper> </Grid> ))} </Grid> </Box> ); }
